title: Swordsmith

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: -Expend one kill charge to attack somebody

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
-Each kill charge you have increases your attack value by one
-You gain a kill charge every night
-If you choose not to use your attack at overkill level, you will stay home and attack all visitors.
-Your attack may not go beyond overkill

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Rid the town of heretics and nonbelievers.
